title: 6-in-10 Americans disapprove of Trump, new poll says
shortDescription: In a new poll released two days before Trump's highly anticipated address to Congress, 60%, said they disapprove of his performance.

title: Why is Trump sending a hospital ship to Greenland? It's unclear.
shortDescription: The president said he was working with Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry to send a hospital boat to the Danish territory: "It's on the way!!!"

title: Which Dem candidate can beat GOP in Texas Senate race? See new poll.
shortDescription: A new poll suggests U.S. Rep. Jasmine Crockett could beat Attorney General Ken Paxton in the Texas U.S. Senate general election, despite a tight Democratic primary.

title: Businesses celebrate win at Supreme Court over Trump on tariffs
shortDescription: Thousands of companies - not just those that sued the Trump administration - will now decide whether to pursue refunds.

title: Who voted against tariffs? Supreme Court strikes down Trump's tariffs
shortDescription: The decision on the tariffs was made 6-3. So, how did each of the nine justices vote?

title: Trump vows global tariff hike
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announces plan to raise global tariffs from 10% to 15% after signing an executive order implementing a reworked 10% levy amid a landmark SCOTUS decision.

title: Democrats say a big tariff refund should be heading your way
shortDescription: Democrats have demanded refunds after the Supreme Court ruled against President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs.

title: Trump escalates Supreme Court clash over tariffs, raises to 15%
shortDescription: President Donald Trump upped new tariffs he announced after the Supreme Court ruled against his emergency tariffs on Feb. 20.

title: Trump floats limited strike on Iran, decision could come within days
shortDescription: 'I guess I am considering that,' President Donald Trump said of as he weighed a limited strike on Iran amid nuclear negotiations.

title: Trump faces high-stakes State of the Union amid 'very rough patch'
shortDescription: “They’re in a very rough patch,” said Quinnipiac University polling analyst Tim Malloy, whose survey recently had Trump's approval rating at 37%.

title: Battle for Trump's brain at State of the Union. Midterms or legacy?
shortDescription: Will it be the-economy-is-fixed Trump or I-feel-your-pain Trump when he addresses Congress? America-First Trump or Nobel-Prize-peacemaker Trump?

title: Trump's support for herbicide seen as a 'betrayal' by MAHA movement
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called it a matter of national defense. But Make America Healthy Again activists say he broke their trust.

title: UK law used to arrest former Prince Andrew: Vague and hard to prove
shortDescription: The law used to arrest Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor raises a key question: Did the globe-trotting royal willfully abuse his position of public trust?

title: What’s next after SCOTUS overturned Trump tariffs
shortDescription: After the Supreme Court overturned President Donald Trump's authority to impose emergency tariffs, he said he'd impose new global 10% tariffs.

title: Trump attacks justices after tariff ruling
shortDescription: President Trump had sharp words for some Supreme Court justices after a landmark decision striking down his power to impose sweeping tariffs.

title: 'A tough hill' but tariff lawyer knew he had SCOTUS case to beat Trump
shortDescription: Veteran Supreme Court lawyer Neal Katyal says he knew he'd beat President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs case, calling his actions 'gravely illegal.'

title: ¿Cómo afecta a México y Sudamérica el bloqueo de los aranceles de Trump?
shortDescription: La Corte anuló los aranceles de Trump, dando alivio a México y Sudamérica, aunque persiste la incertidumbre sobre nuevas medidas comerciales de EE. UU.

title: Trump Erases EPA’s Key Greenhouse Gas Rule
shortDescription: The Trump administration has officially revoked the Environmental Protection Agency’s landmark endangerment finding.
